Andrew Wolson

Role:
Founder, Creative Director
Context:
branding and site design
Website:
fontslate.info

Born from a thirst for knowledge

FontSlate is a personal project of mine that was originally a student project. I created the site because professors would tell me I was using the wrong type. But when I asked them why. They would have no answer for me. After researching and finding font resources are few and far between. I decided to create a site that displayed everything I had learned about typography.

 

branding

The name combines the idea of the site fonts and slate represents the material that black boards are made from. The logo is a circle to represent a period. Meaning we are the definitive source for Font information, period. The gold stands for the quality of the information we provide.

website

The site was designed to prominently display the basic information. But it also keeps a space for more detailed information. I used expand and collapse navigation so the user can get to all of the sites content in one click.
